name: CategoryTheory.Grpd.has_pi
decl:
instance has_pi : Limits.HasProducts.{u} Grpd.{u, u} :=
  Limits.hasProducts_of_limit_fans (by apply piLimitFan) (by apply piLimitFanIsLimit)
